name: Dust-motes
tagline: Repository for contributed helper and filter extensions to dust
body:
### Welcome to dust-motes
 [dust](http://linkedin.github.io/dustjs/) is a JavaScript templating engine. It comes with a number of standard [helpers](https://github.com/linkedin/dustjs/wiki/Dust-Tutorial#wiki-Helpers). Adding every helper anyone might need to the standard set would get crazy and overload the commonly used set. This repository is a collecting point for contributed dust helpers and dust filters that provide features not supported by the standard set.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
